articles.title: Dharmendra expresses sadness over dilapidated theatre in Ludhiana - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The octogenarian actor said he had watched Deedar, a 1950’s classic starring Dilip Kumar, at Raikhy Cinema.
articles.content:
Bollywood actor Dharmendra expressed his sadness over the dilapidated condition of Raikhy Cinema, one of the oldest theatres in Ludhiana, in a Tweet, on Saturday.
